code: import axios from"axios";import{URL}from"../../../apis";export var getComments=function getComments(slug,token){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/articles/").concat(slug,"/comments"),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export var getCommentsNoToken=function getCommentsNoToken(slug){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/articles/").concat(slug,"/comments"),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}});};export var postComment=function postComment(content,slug,token){return axios.post("".concat(URL,"/api/articles/").concat(slug,"/comments"),{comment:{body:content}},{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export var deleteComment=function deleteComment(id,slug,token){return axios.delete("".concat(URL,"/api/articles/").concat(slug,"/comments/").concat(id),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};
